definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

pinyin: zui4 di1 xian4 du4 li3 lun4

definition: to exceed/to go beyond/to overstep the limit

sentences.english: Objective To verify the specificity and validity of the microbial limit tests of glycyrrhetinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立适合于甘草酸的微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: There is a limit to the amount of creative talent available in the world.
sentences.chinese: 人世间的创造力是有一定限度的。

sentences.english: To ensure maximum sales for in-house facilities and cross sell other Regent destinations by continuously promoting them upon inquiry.
sentences.chinese: 确保最大限度地促销本酒店以及连锁酒店的产品。

sentences.english: Finally, the dissertation investigates the value and limitation of Eagleton"s theory."
sentences.chinese: 最后，考察伊格尔顿意识形态理论的价值与限度。
她的美丽超出了人力所能描绘的限度。

sentences.english: We must try our best to reduce the damage to a minumum.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽力把损失减小到最低限度。

sentences.english: Aim To establish a method for microbial limit tests of compound Huaimi capsules.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立复方槐米胶囊微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: Any parcel over the dimension limit should be repacked into smaller ones.
sentences.chinese: 超过最大尺寸限度的包裹应分成若干小件。

sentences.english: Conclusion To the best of pharmacologists and equipment ability.
sentences.chinese: 结论最大限度发挥药剂人员和设备的能力。

sentences.english: The judge will put him behind bars for at leas four years.
sentences.chinese: 法官最低限度也会判他坐四年牢。

sentences.english: This approach maximises the saving of time while minimising cost.
sentences.chinese: 这种方法能最大限度的节省时间，降低了成本。

sentences.english: Diligence and discipline can reduce the incidence of these errors to near zero.
sentences.chinese: 勤奋和自律可以让这些错误造成的影响降至最低限度。

sentences.english: Thus, limits for both MACO and swabs should be set.
sentences.chinese: 因此，应同时设定MACO限度和擦拭限度。

sentences.english: Thus, limits for both MACO and swabs should be set.
sentences.chinese: 因此，应同时设定MACO限度和擦拭限度。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method of microbial limit test for miconazole nitrate liniment.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立硝酸咪康唑搽剂微生物限度检查法。

sentences.english: Any parcels over the max weight should be repacked into small ones.
sentences.chinese: 凡超过重量限度的包裹应分为几个小包裹邮寄。

definition: only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
right (i.e. an entitlement to sth)/(classical) power and wealth
